port.label: Port
port.help: The port to use in relaying messages or commands.

socket_type.label: Socket Type
socket_type.help: (Optional) The UDP Socket type. Default: udp4

data_topic.label: Data Topic
data_topic.help: The topic to listen to for device data. Default: reekoh/data

message_topic.label: Message Topic
message_topic.help: The topic to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: reekoh/messages

groupmessage_topic.label: Group Message Topic
groupmessage_topic.help: The topic to listen to for group messages or commands. Default: reekoh/groupmessages

authorized_topics.label: Authorized Topics
authorized_topics.help: Other authorized topics the devices can subscribe from and/or publish to.
